mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT external_user_id) as sumClickPersonNum, COUNT(id) as sumClickNum FROM we_radar_click_record WHERE radar_id = #{radarId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT external_user_id) clickNum, `channel_name` channelName FROM we_radar_click_record WHERE radar_id = #{radarId} group by channelName order by clickNum desc

SELECT external_user_id externalId, external_user_name `customerName`, user_name userName, channel_name channelName, detail detail, create_time clickTime, channel_type channelType FROM we_radar_click_record WHERE radar_id = #{customerRecord.radarId} AND external_user_id = #{customerRecord.externalId} order by clickTime desc
